text: well you mentioned that reporters have
been put into lockdown on the hill that
is true our reporter is in lockdown
right now inside the House of Commons he
says that it you can smell gunpowder
inside the house and that is just a
scene of chaos right now in the Canadian
Press now reporting that that is
soldiers standing guard at the National
War Memorial which is right down the
street from Parliament Hill has been
shot by an unknown gunman now there are
some reports that he has been
apprehended but for right now it appears
that he has not been that police are
still searching for him witnesses
reported seeing the gunman running
towards the hill which obviously is on
lockdown right now and still don't know
where that gunman is okay so when we say
lockdown in the Parliament building what
does that mean nobody can go in nobody
can leave yeah nobody can go in nobody
can go out there's a SWAT team at the
War Memorial it's right down the street
the RCMP is flooded the front of the
hill so nobody can get in or out
reporters are stuck inside or anybody
that was inside Parliament Hill is still
stuck inside there including our own
Parliament Hill reporter
